title: Joe Biden Wants You to Believe He Is Opposed to Genocide in Gaza
description:
The White House is campaigning to spin Biden’s support for Israel’s war while actively facilitating the slaughter.

The post Joe Biden Wants You to Believe He Is Opposed to Genocide in Gaza appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The Ukrainian Military Is Experimenting With Psychedelic Drug Ibogaine to Treat Traumatic Brain Injuries
description:
Ukraine is working with a founder of the Yippie movement to provide ibogaine to soldiers on and off the battlefield.

The post The Ukrainian Military Is Experimenting With Psychedelic Drug Ibogaine to Treat Traumatic Brain Injuries appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Hakeem Jeffries Bucks AIPAC, Endorses Squad Member Summer Lee
description:
The House Democratic leadership, normally staunch allies of AIPAC, bucked the Israel lobby in favor of incumbent progressive Summer Lee.

The post Hakeem Jeffries Bucks AIPAC, Endorses Squad Member Summer Lee appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The Legal Case Against Joe Biden for Enabling Israel’s Genocide Against Gaza
description:
As the judges at The Hague deliberate on South Africa’s indictment of Israel, a lawsuit against senior U.S. officials for supporting genocide is set to begin in federal court.

The post The Legal Case Against Joe Biden for Enabling Israel’s Genocide Against Gaza appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Senate Kills Measure to Scrutinize Israeli Human Rights Record as Condition for Aid
description:
Sen. Bernie Sanders forced a vote on the resolution, which would have opened the door for Congress to freeze U.S. aid to Israel.

The post Senate Kills Measure to Scrutinize Israeli Human Rights Record as Condition for Aid appeared first on The Intercept.
